text: Andrea Curiale was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Lettere- Gragnano (1503–1517). ==Biography== On 7 July 1503, Andrea Curiale was appointed during the papacy of Pope Alexander VI as Bishop of Lettere- Gragnano. He served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano until his resignation in 1517. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Alexander VI
title: Andrea Curiale
